audio_file: Relay the message Joseph Dela Cruz Christian Barbin 030525.wav

transcription.text: Hello?
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Good morning, sir. Hello po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Oh, dito?
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Good morning, sir. Joseph Delacruz from CreditMax. Calling in behalf of Mayapang over the recorded line. Sir Christian, bago tayo mag-prepaid for verification lang.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Okay. Hindi ako si Christian eh. Bakit ako? Hindi ako si Christian.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Hindi okay si Christian, sir. Paano-ano niyo siya?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Hindi. Bakit ko?
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Kapatid niyo, ho. Sir, baka pwede siya makausap. Nandyan ho ba?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Wala, wala. Hindi. Magkahiwalay kami eh.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Ah, magkahiwala yung kanilang lugar.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Tapos nabanggit ka na sa akin yan. Sa Maya ba yan?
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Ah, ah, ah.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Oo. Oo, yung aksidente niya napindot yung utang.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Ah, so yun na lang, sir, ha. Paano na lang sa kanya na ito.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Akala niya libre. Na-scam siya. Pero sinabi ko naman ngayon na kasi yung cellphone niya sira eh. Wala siyang magamit na para nakapag-download ng apps eh. Ng Maya eh. Pero babayaran niya talagang. Okay, okay, okay.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Ah, kung ano't regarding sa mayahan.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Oo.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Salamat.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Kasi ako yung ginamit niya, ano diyan? Ina-ano rin ako. Sa akin talagang talagang yung mga... Ewan eh.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Pasuyo na lang, sir, ha. Salamat po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Sinabi ko naman sa kanya yan. Kasi cellphone niya ngayon sira eh.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Okay po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Pero sabi niya babayaran yan.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Pasuyo na lang, ho, na tumawag ulit yung regarding sa maya. Salamat. Have a good day, po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

translation.tagalog: Hello?
translation.english: How are you?

translation.tagalog: Good morning, sir. Hello po.
translation.english: Good morning, sir. Hello. How are you?

translation.tagalog: Oh, dito?
translation.english: Oh, here?

translation.tagalog: Good morning, sir. Joseph Delacruz from CreditMax. Calling in behalf of Mayapang over the recorded line. Sir Christian, bago tayo mag-prepaid for verification lang.
translation.english: Good morning, Mr. Joseph Delacruz from CreditMax, calling on behalf of Mayapang over the recorded line.

translation.tagalog: Okay. Hindi ako si Christian eh. Bakit ako? Hindi ako si Christian.
translation.english: I'm not a Christian, why am I a Christian?

translation.tagalog: Hindi okay si Christian, sir. Paano-ano niyo siya?
translation.english: Christian is okay, sir. How come you're not him?

translation.tagalog: Hindi. Bakit ko?
translation.english: Why not me?

translation.tagalog: Kapatid niyo, ho. Sir, baka pwede siya makausap. Nandyan ho ba?
translation.english: Your brother, sir, he may be able to speak.

translation.tagalog: Wala, wala. Hindi. Magkahiwalay kami eh.
translation.english: No, no, no. We're going to break up.

translation.tagalog: Ah, magkahiwala yung kanilang lugar.
translation.english: Ah, that's their place.

translation.tagalog: Tapos nabanggit ka na sa akin yan. Sa Maya ba yan?
translation.english: You've already mentioned that to me.

translation.tagalog: Ah, ah, ah.
translation.english: Ah, ah, ah. What are you doing?

translation.tagalog: Oo. Oo, yung aksidente niya napindot yung utang.
translation.english: Yes, the accident was a debt.

translation.tagalog: Ah, so yun na lang, sir, ha. Paano na lang sa kanya na ito.
translation.english: Ah, that's it, sir, ha.

translation.tagalog: Akala niya libre. Na-scam siya. Pero sinabi ko naman ngayon na kasi yung cellphone niya sira eh. Wala siyang magamit na para nakapag-download ng apps eh. Ng Maya eh. Pero babayaran niya talagang. Okay, okay, okay.
translation.english: I'm not sure if it's a scam, but I'm sure it's a scam, and I'm sure it's a scam, and I'm sure it's a scam, and I'm sure it's a scam, and I'm sure it's a scam.

translation.tagalog: Ah, kung ano't regarding sa mayahan.
translation.english: Ah, what about the farm.

translation.tagalog: Oo.
translation.english: Yes, you did.

translation.tagalog: Salamat.
translation.english: Thank you.

translation.tagalog: Kasi ako yung ginamit niya, ano diyan? Ina-ano rin ako. Sa akin talagang talagang yung mga... Ewan eh.
translation.english: I'm the one who used it, what's that? I'm the one who used it. I'm the one who used it.

translation.tagalog: Pasuyo na lang, sir, ha. Salamat po.
translation.english: Just go ahead, sir, thank you.

translation.tagalog: Sinabi ko naman sa kanya yan. Kasi cellphone niya ngayon sira eh.
translation.english: I told him that because his cell phone is broken now.

translation.tagalog: Okay po.
translation.english: It's all right.

translation.tagalog: Pero sabi niya babayaran yan.
translation.english: But he said he would pay for it.

translation.tagalog: Pasuyo na lang, ho, na tumawag ulit yung regarding sa maya. Salamat. Have a good day, po.
